hand very

know we're not for profit with the
mission of providing a free worldclass

started out as a way to remotely tutor

we're a team of 60 plus people with

and the effort now reaches over 10

month what really convinced me to quit

free my Daydreams which were pretty

just what might happen if we can have

using the technology at our

going back to the year

they might have said if you have an

what would that mean for The Human

instead I'm asking that you approach

off
blinders because in 10 or 15 years and I
